metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2959 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's watch queue due to amissing lock in pipe_resize_ring(). The specific flaw exists within thehandling of pipe buffers. The issue results from the lack of proper lockingwhen performing operations on an object. This flaw allows a local user tocrash the system or escalate their privileges on the system.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2959` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-47-generic - 5.15.0-47.51
